description:
Keep your small passenger toasty warm in a stroller or bike trailer. The down fill moulds itself to tiny bodies to surround them with warmth. Zip the top right open for diaper changes or to regulate their temperature.

  • Best for children 3 months to 18 months
  • Outer fabric is Pertex Microlight ripstop nylon with a DWR finish. Printed lining is 100% recycled polyester
  • Fill is 650-fill power duck down that meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare
  • Total length is 100cm. Width at widest point is 50cm
  • Top curve of hood adjusts with hidden drawcord
  • Slots are designed to fit seats and strollers with 5-point harnesses
  • Note: Do not use this product as a sleeping bag. It does not have arms, so a child may turn inside the bag. Combined with a fabric that is not highly breathable, there is potential for suffocation
name: MEC Ride Warm Down Stroller Bag - Infants to Children
